### removeCase() {#afa6137fa4de3e04d7bdae0144bbd9905}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>SwitchInst::CaseIt llvm::sandboxir::SwitchInst::removeCase (<a href="#a78fb7e289fcc41d240d8fce1cf54c312">CaseIt</a> It)</>}>
This method removes the specified case and its successor from the switch instruction.

Note that this operation may reorder the remaining cases at index idx and above. Note: This action invalidates iterators for all cases following the one removed, including the <a href="#ad812490c6d2d45b9fcb537290c44bc6c">case&#95;end()</a> iterator. It returns an iterator for the next case.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/sandboxir/instruction-h/#l01926">1926</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/sandboxir/instruction-h">Instruction.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/sandboxir/instruction-cpp/#l01138">1138</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/sandboxir/instruction-cpp">Instruction.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
